alert.note: Alert for Dundy (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 3:00AM CST until December 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Little or no snow accumulation is expected. Northwest winds gusting up to 55 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma and Kit Carson Counties. In Kansas, Cheyenne and Sherman Counties. In Nebraska, Dundy County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow will likely reduce visibility at times and could briefly lower them to near zero in spots. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
